00055       function                _set_rewrite_map( $PackageScriptPath = false , $FileName = 'local_rewrite_map' )
00056       {
00057             try
00058             {
00059                   global            $RewriteMap;
00060                   if( $PackageScriptPath !== false )
00061                   {
00062                         $RewriteMap = _file_get_contents( dirname( $PackageScriptPath )."/conf/$FileName" );
00063                         if( $RewriteMap === false )
00064                         {
00065                               return;
00066                         }
00067                         $RewriteMap = str_replace( "\r" , "\n" , $RewriteMap );
00068                         $RewriteMap = str_replace( "\n\n" , "\n" , $RewriteMap );
00069                         if( $RewriteMap != '' )
00070                         {
00071                               $RewriteMap = explode( "\n" , $RewriteMap );
00072                               for( $i = 0 ; $i < count( $RewriteMap ) ; $i++ )
00073                               {
00074                                     $RewriteMap[ $i ] = explode( '#' , $RewriteMap[ $i ] );
00075                               }
00076                               return;
00077                         }
00078                         $RewriteMap = false;
00079                   }
00080             }
00081             catch( Exception $e )
00082             {
00083                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00084             }
00085       }
00086       
00101       function                _reset_rewrite_map()
00102       {
00103             try
00104             {
00105                   global            $RewriteMap;
00106                   $RewriteMap = false;
00107             }
00108             catch( Exception $e )
00109             {
00110                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00111             }
00112       }

00114       $MakeFullVersionCacheChanged = false;
00115       $MakeFullVersionCache = array();
00116       
00139       function                _complete_package_version( $PackageName )
00140       {
00141             $FullPackageVersion = '';
00142             
00143             $Packages = explode( '::' , $PackageName );
00144             if( isset( $Packages[ 1 ] ) )
00145             {
00146                   $l = count( $Packages ) - 1;
00147                   for( $i = 0 ; $i < $l ; $i++ )
00148                   {
00149                         $FullPackageVersion .= 'last::';
00150                   }
00151             }
00152             
00153             return( $FullPackageVersion );
00154       }
00155       
00182       function                      _make_full_version( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00183       {
00184             try
00185             {
00186                   global      $MakeFullVersionCache;
00187                   if( isset( $MakeFullVersionCache[ "$PackageName.$PackageVersion" ] ) )
00188                   {
00189                         return( $MakeFullVersionCache[ "$PackageName.$PackageVersion" ] );
00190                   }
00191                   
00192                   $FullPackageVersion = $PackageVersion;
00193                   if( $PackageVersion == 'last' || strpos( $PackageVersion , '::' ) === false )
00194                   {
00195                         $FullPackageVersion = _complete_package_version( $PackageName ).$PackageVersion;
00196                   }
00197                   
00198                   global      $MakeFullVersionCacheChanged;
00199                   $MakeFullVersionCacheChanged = true;
00200                   
00201                   return( $MakeFullVersionCache[ "$PackageName.$PackageVersion" ] = $FullPackageVersion );
00202             }
00203             catch( Exception $e )
00204             {
00205                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00206             }
00207       }

00239       function                      _apply_to_the_whole_name( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $Rules )
00240       {
00241             try
00242             {
00243                   global      $RewriteMap;
00244                   
00245                   foreach( $RewriteMap as $i => $r )
00246                   {
00247                         if( preg_match( $r[ 0 ] , $PackageName.'.'.$PackageVersion ) > 0 )
00248                         {
00249                               $PackageName = $r[ 1 ];
00250                               $PackageVersion = $r[ 2 ];
00251                               break;
00252                         }
00253                   }
00254                   
00255                   return( array( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) );
00256             }
00257             catch( Exception $e )
00258             {
00259                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00260             }
00261       }

00293       function                      _apply_to_the_parts( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $Rules )
00294       {
00295             try
00296             {
00297                   global      $RewriteMap;
00298                   
00299                   $PackageNameSegments = explode( '::' , $PackageName );
00300                   $PackageVersionSegments = explode( '::' , $PackageVersion );
00301                   
00302                   foreach( $RewriteMap as $r )
00303                   {
00304                         for( $j = 0 ; $j < count( $PackageNameSegments ) ; $j++ )
00305                         {
00306                               if( preg_match( $r[ 0 ] , $PackageNameSegments[ $j ].'.'.$PackageVersionSegments[ $j ] ) > 0 )
00307                               {
00308                                     $PackageNameSegments[ $j ] = $r[ 1 ];
00309                                     $PackageInfoParts = explode( '.' , $r[ 2 ] );
00310                                     
00311                                     if( count( $PackageInfoParts ) == 2 )
00312                                     {
00313                                           $PackageVersionSegments[ $j ] = $PackageInfoParts[ 0 ];
00314                                     }
00315                                     else
00316                                     {
00317                                           $PackageVersionSegments[ $j ]  = $PackageInfoParts[ 0 ].'.';
00318                                           $PackageVersionSegments[ $j ] .= $PackageInfoParts[ 1 ].'.';
00319                                           $PackageVersionSegments[ $j ] .= $PackageInfoParts[ 2 ];
00320                                     }
00321                                     
00322                                     break;
00323                               }
00324                         }
00325                   }
00326                   
00327                   $PackageName = implode( '::' , $PackageNameSegments );
00328                   $PackageVersion = implode( '::' , $PackageVersionSegments );
00329                         
00330                   return( array( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) );
00331             }
00332             catch( Exception $e )
00333             {
00334                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00335             }
00336       }

00364       function                _apply_both_transforms( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00365       {
00366             try
00367             {
00368                   # \~russian пытаемся применить карты рерайтов ко всему имени пакета
00369                   # \~english trying to apply rewrite map to the hole package name and version
00370                   global      $RewriteMap;
00371                   list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _apply_to_the_whole_name( 
00372                         $PackageName , 
00373                         $PackageVersion , 
00374                         $RewriteMap 
00375                   );
00376                   $PackageVersion = _make_full_version( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00377                   # \~russian пытаемся применить карты рерайтов к части имени пакета
00378                   # \~english trying to apply rewrite map to the part of the package name and version
00379                   $NameParts = explode( '::' , $PackageName );
00380                   $VersionParts = explode( '::' , $PackageVersion );
00381                   list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _apply_to_the_parts( 
00382                         $PackageName , 
00383                         $PackageVersion , 
00384                         $RewriteMap 
00385                   );
00386                   return( array( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) );
00387             }
00388             catch( Exception $e )
00389             {
00390                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00391             }
00392       }

00424       function                _apply_local_rewrite_map( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath )
00425       {
00426             try
00427             {
00428                   _set_rewrite_map( $PackageScriptPath );
00429                   
00430                   global            $RewriteMap;
00431                   
00432                   if( $RewriteMap !== false )
00433                   {
00434                         # \~russian пытаемся применить карты рерайтов ко всему имени пакета
00435                         # \~english trying to apply rewrite map to the hole package name and version
00436                         
00437                         list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _apply_both_transforms( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00438                   }
00439                   
00440                   return( array( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) );
00441             }
00442             catch( Exception $e )
00443             {
00444                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00445             }
00446       }

00449       $RewritedPackageCacheChanged = false;
00450       
00451       global $RewritedPackageCache;
00452       $RewritedPackageCache = array();

00484       function                _apply_global_rewrite_map( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ROOT_DIR )
00485       {
00486             try
00487             {
00488                   global      $RewritedPackageCache;
00489                   $Key = "$PackageName $PackageVersion $ROOT_DIR";
00490                   if( isset( $RewritedPackageCache[ $Key ] ) === false )
00491                   {
00492                         _set_rewrite_map( "$ROOT_DIR/packages/_core_data/unexisting_file" , "cf_global_rewrite_rules" );
00493                         global      $RewriteMap;
00494                         if( $RewriteMap !== false )
00495                         {
00496                               list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _apply_both_transforms( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00497                         }
00498                         _reset_rewrite_map();
00499                         global      $RewritedPackageCacheChanged;
00500                         
00501                         $RewritedPackageCacheChanged = true;
00502                         $RewritedPackageCache[ $Key ] = array( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00503                   }
00504                   return( $RewritedPackageCache[ $Key ] );
00505             }
00506             catch( Exception $e )
00507             {
00508                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00509             }
00510       }

00542       function                _apply_rewrites( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $PackageScriptPath )
00543       {
00544             try
00545             {
00546                   list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _apply_local_rewrite_map( 
00547                         $PackageName , 
00548                         $PackageVersion , 
00549                         $PackageScriptPath
00550                   );
00551                   
00552                   # глобальная переадресация
00553                   # global rewriting
00554                   list( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) = _apply_global_rewrite_map( 
00555                         $PackageName , 
00556                         $PackageVersion , 
00557                         INSTALL_DIR 
00558                   );
00559                   
00560                   return( array( $PackageName , $PackageVersion ) );
00561             }
00562             catch( Exception $e )
00563             {
00564                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00565             }
00566       }
